name: Blop Stroll - GMTK Discord Menu Jam Entry
name_original: Blop Stroll - GMTK Discord Menu Jam Entry
description: This 'game' was made for the GMTK Discord Menu Jam, from 31st April to 7th May 2021. My main aims with this were to work on game theming - getting the right title/logo/music et.c. for the tone and mood I want to set - get nicer looking menus working in general, and to improve my understanding of the Unity animation system. Most of the art used in the 'demo mode' was done for practice before the start of the jam period. Music via Kevin McLoed, full credits in game.
